name: KATISOFT
author: Thien Pham

sections.description:
This is the KaTiSoft plugin that includes the features needed for a basic website.

If you want to contact me for any reason, feel free to email me at chithien175@gmail.com or contact me on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ltvthienpham

Features you will love

Moduler Adminstrator Area:
– Custom Post Type Manager.
– Custom Taxonomy Manager | Add Taxonomy for Post Type.
– Widget to Upload and Display media in sidebars.
– Testimonial section: Comment in the front-end, Admins can approve comments, select which comments to display.
– Ajax based Login/Register system.
– Gutenburg Blocks.
– WP Mail SMTP.
– Alo Phone Icon Ring Ring.
– Messenger Facebook Fan Page Manager.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the katisoft folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
There are no questions for this item?

Yes.

  • Add Gutenburg Blocks.
